subject: Get 50 Pod Points From iPodSweepstakes.
body:
Win A Free iPod From ipodsweepstakes.com





























Free Nintendo Wii and 4 Pod Points
Just for entering your email address you will get 4 Pod Points, but you could also get a FREE Nintendo Wii! 

Get 4 Pod Points just for entering your email address!
 Click Here. 


4 Pod Points





























Free Mach3 Razor and 4 Pod Points
Just fill out your shipping address and they will send you a FREE Mach3 Razor!

Get 4 Pod Points when you request a Mach3 Razor for FREE!
 Click Here. 


4 Pod Points





























Thirty Plus Christians and 14 Pod Points
Are you looking for a better way to connect with quality singles?  Then, Thirty Plus Christians is your perfect choice!  

Get 14 Pod Points when you try Thirty Plus Christians for FREE!
 Click Here. 


14 Pod Points





























Free Auto Loan Quote and 28 Pod Points
Getting an auto loan had never been so easy!  In less than one minute, you'll be on your way to an auto loan quote even without perfect credit.  

Get 28 Pod Points just for requesting a FREE auto loan quote! 
 Click Here. 


28 Pod Points













Hurry, These Offers ExpireFriday, July 6, 2007!

      You have received this message as part of your iPodSweepstakes.com membership. You agreed to receive these offers by email on
      8/16/2006 12:22:19 PM.  If this appears to be in error, or if you no longer wish to receive email from us,
      click here or email Helpdesk@iPodSweepstakes.com and type "unsubscribe" in the subject line, or write to us at 945 Clint Moore Road, Boca Raton, FL 33487.
